In order to receive British Airways Executive Club Avios, you need to collect a minimum of 150 points per collection period. If you don't reach this amount, your points will be carried forward to your next statement.
You can top up your savings with your own money in store and also receive bonus vouchers.
In order to receive Clubcard vouchers, you need to collect a minimum of 150 points per collection period. If you don't reach this amount, your points will be carried forward to your next statement.

In order to receive Virgin Atlantic Flying Club miles, you need to collect a minimum of 150 points per collection period. If you don't reach this amount, your points will be carried forward to your next statement.
